documents.document: @GerryMcBride And in the end, you'll fall, betrayed by one of the socks.
@GerryMcBride And be disappointed that it's gone all politically correct.
@rodericogorman Yes. The link works but the page is broken because the web server doesn't quite handle the broken URL. Edge case.
@rodericogorman By the by, you put a sort-of broken link into your article about Snugborough junction - extra '.' after '.ie' in the URL.
@rodericogorman Ha ha, I will. And stay off Twitter on Sunday, no good will come of it :-)
@rodericogorman > routing some cycle/pedestrian traffic there. Just a thought, but I've come across it numerous times.
@rodericogorman > linking the two parks via the existing paths. You have an opportunity to link the parks, increasing use of both and >
@rodericogorman Just got your flier about the Snugborough interch. One thought - seems like you're missing one trick, with (1/34)
@niallohiggins I don't know how sturdy it will be in the long run though. Air and water pressure are hard work.
@niallohiggins It builds up actual air pressure. It's quite clever, and I was a bit obsessed with getting hold of a manual espresso maker.
@niallohiggins Not quite. This is much closer to an espresso mechanism and it makes a genuine espresso. Aeropress is a nice filter coffee.
Staresso espresso maker. Forget the Aeropress, this is where it is at for manual espresso making. https://t.co/glGb71VFAm
@dvddnh No worries mate, if any other part of the Internet is giving you trouble then give me a shout I'm always here
@MajorThrill @RudyHellzapop ”Lucky escape for Arsenal if it did.”
@MajorThrill @RudyHellzapop ”Oh yes, sir, so you said,” said the barman, looking over his glasses this time at Arthur.
@MajorThrill @RudyHellzapop ”No, no,” said Ford, ”it’s just that the world’s about to end.”
@RudyHellzapop @MajorThrill Or the end of the world. A lot of that in the air too.
Here I am, posting on Twitter. But I'm going to get into distributed social media. We all should. This isn't healthy for society.
@wefail Looking good, Martin. The ECT is going well.
@dvddnh It's an interesting read, but don't take it as canonical. It's very hyperbolic, subject to confirmation bias.
@wefail Either that or the salt mines. It would be a close call if you had to choose your post-Brexit lifestyle.
@oceanclub I used to have fucks to give about it but sadly now I don’t.
@wefail That’s not comedy, that’s what it’s like in every household living in Dublin. You, post-Brexit, I might add.
@TheHonestPaddy No. I'd look down at him, and tell him to get on his bike, and chuckle like a clever, witty granddad.
@TheHonestPaddy THEY'RE NOT TERRORISTS THEY'RE JUST TERMINALLY FIT GUYS ON BICYCLES
I think he was more of a drug dealer than a... Ahh, but the lines can get blurred in practice. Sharp! @TheHonestPaddy
In Ireland we are concerned about terrorists sneaking in. We've never had terrorists here, not even the world's most successful terrorists.
@Alotron I was one of millions in my class who did.

TRUMP IS GREAT TRUMP IS GREAT TRU.
Damn new chip. https://t.co/g7Ftl1iIyt
By a curious co-incidence, there's an interview with Ruth Negga which is worth reading. You'll see why. The Irish Times is in a dark place.
I was going to do one of my mock-ups on the idea of it, but actually the Irish Times has gone there.
On the Irish Times effectively running a piece on upside of Eugenics. https://t.co/6vS7fEqVMg
@oceanclub @IrishTimes I still can't believe that they would run that.
@gerrowadat Ha ha, imagine some lad in the office telling you that if you ask him what's going to happen while the data centre's down.

@TheSeducktress I could've done so much more though. Could've.
But. Vin Diesel et al.
I could've read an interesting book about autism. Could've. Instead, I watched people blow up a military plane by driving very fast.
@wefail You've become very naive since starting that Instagram account. It's like you're turning your cop-on into paint.
@GerryMcBride Any nefarious organisation, fictional or real, would look at Trump’s win & go “Shit… Look at that. He did it like it was easy”
@TheHonestPaddy OH FUCK I SHOULDVE KNOWN
Guys, everything's going to be ok. It's snowing!
2016: The year Western Civilisation jumped the shark. This year we start the disorderly wind-down.
@munitionsfamily Also, he is being hosed down in the dark. He is basically being waterboarded, no wonder he is sick-feeling.
What up with framework love bro. What up. https://t.co/sdyn7a9Gy4
@mickfox THEY HAVE IDENTIFIED YOU AS ONE OF THE WEAK ONES OF THE HERD
@Podgeypoos79 "AngularJS - Bureaucracy for JavaScript" - I should get it made into a t-shirt and make my millions.
@Podgeypoos79 > Angular, I mean. Not your workshop. That would be creepy. Thanks for jumpstarting me!
@Podgeypoos79 Hey, I don’t know if you remember but I went to your Angular workshop last year. Now I’m spending a lot of time in it! >
@mickfox Have you tried installing an iOS content blocker?
@wefail “Been down here 71 years, mate. Don’t see me whinging about it. Have they got the flying cars yet?”
@RudyHellzapop @johnorthside It would be a terrible shame for the State to fall asunder for want of a booking or a bit of planning.
@RudyHellzapop @johnorthside Shit, time has flown faster than I had realised. Really enjoyed the commentary.
Christ, I find and share this on Sunday afternoon. I should get behind this in a big way. https://t.co/0XZtRd2TVY
@RudyHellzapop @johnorthside Thought you were there last year?
Is there any way of telling is someone’s going to Nazi? There must be some symptoms or indication? @Fergal
@GerryMcBride Did they try to sell you extended product warranty with that? It’s basically Argos with food.
@munitionsfamily @dvddnh So snared. He doesn’t have a hope of being president after this debacle.
@electionlit I used to. A bad habit. You can get mind cancer from doing that.
@TheKavOfficial Ha ha, that’s hilarious. Nice strategy on your part, hat off to you.
> Far Right - was a great idea. And then attempted to argue the toss afterwards. All this has happened before, etc).
(For context, the Irish Times thought that running an article explaining the Far Right's terminology - written by a member of the >
Well, that escalated quickly. https://t.co/4yjMkdkG3V
@munitionsfamily Fucking posting photos of it everywhere like a one-man tabloid operation
@munitionsfamily There's a frustrating lack of detail here that makes a statistical analysis next to impossible.
@munitionsfamily Seriously though, on a plane. That's rough. Were they on the way back from somewhere or going there? Married?
Lads, tomorrow morning I'm get my Chrome dev tools out and editing the Irish Times front page again. Big stick time.
@Tupp_Ed I think we’re going to have to nationalise your Twitter feed in the greater social interest. Just for a while.

@munitionsfamily In real-time? You’re live-tweeting a break-up?
I have hyphenated-everything?
@alex_meehan Leave it in. It’s only a puncture when it comes out. Until then, it is decorative.
@mickfox Reporting you to your employer for malthinkance tbh @carolynmoore_ie
@mickfox That made me laugh loudly. 5kg would last me at least 3 weeks.
@TheSeducktress ANIMALS DONT HAVE SEX PARTS THEY ARRIVE BY STORK I SAW IT IN A MOVIE ONCE
@SlashBrady Also, reference: https://t.co/Uor9Cc1nzf
@SlashBrady How’s that even a burn. They’re selling sticks of titanium with styrofoam for mental money. But I’m going one better.
Buying a load of these and marketing them in a foil wrapper as the ultimate programming focus aid for a 20x mark-up. https://t.co/u8K79xF3EZ
@GerryMcBride Seriously, Gerry. You can get beer all year, but you can only get Christmas stollen between September and February.
Also looking to challenge Dwayne Johnson and Kanye West in a surprise upset for the 2020 US presidential election.… https://t.co/L9oB6Ml67c
@GerryMcBride Me with chocolate. And the Christmas mince pies. And the stollen, which is going cheap now. Fuck it, the food, generally.
@MajorThrill The 44 is a rough odyssey. That’s why he went when the usual suspects are still asleep. It’s not a posh route.
@JeniPim Are you going to be ok? That doesn’t look like a happy place.
@rubot I'm not even worried about the Clinton paedophilia network against the white night of Trump statements any more. Just the noise.
@rubot I got him to take the rotting fruit off his desk but the coding aloud thing, that'll take violence or worse. I accept this truth.
@rubot He's not going to. I've been sitting next to him for months and he's not going to have it.
@SlashBrady I think it can be implemented now by plugin but it's not as safe a system-wide blocklist.
@SlashBrady Maybe. But apparently they sold out. You can get whitelisted if they like you. So I read a while back.
I should send that guy some money. He's doing it out of his own time, collating from all the sources.
I can't help you with doing it but I'll find some links to help people. If you can, do it. Filter the stream of shit out of your Internet.
Feel free to share. The world would be a very slightly better place if a lot of this stuff didn't make it to people's browsers.
A little New year's gift, in light of some of what made 2016 a little rougher: a hosts file. Read attached image to… https://t.co/CUC2ABp9f9
@atoast2toast @dvddnh @neilcreagh Well, that took an unexpected turn.
Anyone out there? Any hints? I love a new meme that's a mashup of Gladwell, TV3 and fake news, but I need to unders… https://t.co/MRrZJbeMRZ
@dvddnh @neilcreagh Exactly. I bid 20 quatloos on the newcomer.
@neilcreagh I don’t get the joke but I’m buying in. Let’s see how this unfolds. My money’s on the table.
@munitionsfamily Nice beard and excellent Grohl positioning. Very tasteful. I’ll have two beards please.
@GerryMcBride Ah here. The beer done you harm, boy. https://t.co/5e4GhSn5N2
@munitionsfamily *Aim for New Year: Taking and keeping Arch Music Troll title. Off to a thunderous opening gambit.
@GerryMcBride I’ve seen things you people wouldn’t believe. Attack lanterns on fire off the shoulder of McBride.
@wefail A new low in turtle photography focus.
@cmcgovern I think it’s a sign-post to the decay of what we understand to be Western culture. Not for everyone else, though.
@GerryMcBride Back up a bit here, McBride. I read your Virgin Megastore story with tears in my eyes. You’ve just torn it all down.
@EXECUTIVESTEVE I am eating drop right now. In my mother's house, in Wexford. No hagelslag, however. White bread, butter and hagelslag. Aww.
